name: Bhiring
tag_list: hiring, cost, recruitment-contracts, recruitment-process, placement-firm, outplacement
description: Bhiring.com is a b2b recruitment portal
overview:
Bhiring.com helps corporate in working with 100s of consultants and reducing the recruitment cost. It also helps HR placement firms in getting recruitment contract.

Bhiring.com is a b2b recruitment portal which aims at reducing the recruitment cost and making the hiring more productive. A corporate can tap 100s of consultants and can work with all of them at a same time, thus speeding up the recruitment and saving cost. A corporate, registered on bhiring.com gets full authority to quote its own budget and thus avoid any price negotiation and reduce the recruitment cycle.

The main aim of bhiring.com is to reduce recruitment cost of corporate, to enable them to get in touch with as many as HR Placement firms possible and fill vacancies faster and economical.

Bhiring.com belongs to the group that also owns and runs a job portal www.jobkeeda.com. Jobkeeda.com is based on the foundation - Jobs for everyone and everywhere. Jobkeeda.com aims at showing the hidden jobs in the market. Through jobkeeda.com, the group wants to show the jobs in oneâ€™s neighborhood, those jobs which is most of the time not available in other job portals or are with the HR Placement firms. At present jobkeeda.com is showing around 1000 jobs available only in Mumbai.
